channel.title: (Hammer Editor) Entity Names Changes Model?
channel.description: I was recently trying to figure out how to manipulate the model of a character, I used some BM maps to figure out what changed there model, as a last resort I changed there name and boom it worked, so is this a thing and if so, how do I know what name to choose to get a certain model, is there a list anyone has laying around xD?

item.title: (Hammer Editor) Entity Names Changes Model?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
If you go into the scripts/ folder there’s a file called character_manifest.txt which holds all the face presets for the human characters and associated names - I assume that’s the one you’re looking for.

Read full topic

item.title: (Hammer Editor) Entity Names Changes Model?
item.dc:creator: Gerald_Foreman
item.description:
I was recently trying to figure out how to manipulate the model of a character, I used some BM maps to figure out what changed there model, as a last resort I changed there name and boom it worked, so is this a thing and if so, how do I know what name to choose to get a certain model, is there a list anyone has laying around xD?
